name: Kletba Vlčího Moru
description:
This is an indie 2D hand-drawn platformer game which takes place in fantasy environment set in Czechia. You will embody a creature consumed by hatred and get revenge on your enemies in this short game.


Experience the thrill of high-flying acrobatics and lightning-fast dashes in this action-packed adventure. Master the art of jumping and unleash your powerful dash ability to navigate through challenging levels and defeat formidable enemies.



Experience the thrill of wall-running as you defy gravity and navigate through challenging levels in this action-packed platformer.



Immerse yourself in a captivating world of 13 unique abilities with stunning visualizations, as you explore the enchanting tree of powers. Experience the thrill of mastering each ability and unleash your true potential in this mesmerizing adventure.

Features:


  • 2 worlds – the physical world and the world of spirits
  • Hand-drawn art
  • Colour and flower symbolism
  • 13 unlockable abillities
  • Many dangerous encounters

Available language options:

  • Czech
  • English
